summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding alerts generated for Richard Kahn and Darren Indyke as part of an AML compliance review. The alerts were cleared by AML Compliance as false positives based on discrepancies in location and age. The document highlights the compliance process for monitoring clients associated with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the AML compliance process and is communicating alerts regarding Richard Kahn and Darren Indyke.

persons.name: Renee Salhi
persons.context: Renee Salhi reviews and clears the alerts related to Richard Kahn from an AML perspective.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the subject of multiple alerts regarding his compliance status and is identified as an attorney at HBRK Associates in New York.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned in relation to a PCR alert but is previously KYC approved.

connections.description: Cynthia Rodriguez and Renee Salhi are both part of the AML compliance team at Deutsche Bank.

Cynthia Rodriguez is involved in the AML compliance review process for Darren Indyke.
Renee Salhi clears alerts related to Richard Kahn as part of the AML compliance process.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is associated with multiple alerts regarding compliance issues but is cleared by AML Compliance.
Darren Indyke has a PCR alert but no specific issues are referenced.
Cynthia Rodriguez and Renee Salhi are part of the AML compliance team at Deutsche Bank.
The alerts for Richard Kahn were cleared based on discrepancies in location and age.
Richard Kahn is identified as an attorney at HBRK Associates in New York.
